pageProduct.name: Oli6 Stage 3 Dairy Goat Milk Formula Toddler 800g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Stage 3 - From 12 months - 36 months. It is designed to provide key nutrients for toddlers when nutritional intake is inadequate.
800gm

Oli6 Dairy Goat Toddler Milk Drink is for toddlers one year and older. Contains approximately 36 serves.
Our Dairy Goat Toddler Milk Drink is the smart choice because it contains prebiotic Oligos. Oligos have been suggested to provide gut & immune health and help to promote beneficial bacteria in humans. Made from Dairy Goat Milk
Oli6 Toddler milk is a source of Magnesium for normal growth and development, Vitamin A for eye and vision development, calcium for strong bones and teeth, and Vitamin C for immunity
Has occurring prebiotic Oligos to help provide gut and immune health
Gentle on tiny tummies.
Manufactured in Australia, adhering to the strict Australian regulatory guidelines
Enriched with essential fatty acids DHA & ARA and both Prebiotics and Probiotics. Provides the benefits of 18 essential vitamins and minerals to support normal growth and development in children. Oli6 is the only brand with a unique blend of 6 beneficial prebiotics, probiotics, oligos and vitamins to aid digestion, immunity and brain development.

Suitable For: Toddlers 1-3 years

Product Claims: Oli6 is the only brand with a unique blend of 6 beneficial prebiotics, probiotics, oligos and vitamins to aid digestion, immunity and brain development.

Boxed Contents: Powder

Size: 800g

Flavour: Natural

Serving Size: 165 ml when prepared as intructed

Servings Per Pack: approximately 36

KEY FEATURES

• The natural prebiotics found in goat's milk promote good bacteria and reduce the incidence of bad bacteria aiding digestion.
• There are up to 6 times the amount of prebiotic oligos in goat's milk when compared to standard cow's milk
• Goat milk is considered the closest alternative to human breast milk as it has 5 of the same
• Oli 6 contains a natural probiotic BB536 which is scientifically proven to inhibit the growth of harmful bacteria.?This natural probiotic suppresses inflammatory responses and enhances intestinal barrier function.
• Algae sourced DHA
• Prebiotic oligosacchirides to aid digestion
• Vitamins A and D to aid immunity
• Zinc and Vitamin C to aid brain development and cognitive function

Warnings

Follow instructions exactly.
Do not use if the foil seal is broken.
Allergens: This product contains milk and milk ingredients.

Ingredients

Goat milk solids (51%), lactose, vegetable oils (including soybean), DHA Powder, minerals (calcium carbonate, ferric pyrophosphate, zinc oxide), oligosaccharides (2'-O-fucosyllactose, lacto-N-neotetraose), vitamins (C, E, niacin, A, D3, B12, folic acid, B1, B6, B2), lutein.

Allergen Contains: Milk| Soybean

Directions

Fill the enclosed scoop and smooth off using the built-in leveller. Avoid compacting the powder. Put three level scoops of Toddler Milk Drink into a bottle or feeding cup with 150mL of water.
Place the cap on the bottle or feeding cup and shake well to dissolve the powder. If using a normal cup ensure the Milk Drink is fully stirred in.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Before preparing the milk drink, wash your hands thoroughly. Ensure all utensils are clean.
Using safe drinking water, pour the required amount into the bottle or feeding cup.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Feed immediately and discard any of the unfinished Milk Drink.

Storage Temperature: Cool, dry conditions away from direct heat sources.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recyclable tin, lid and scoop

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
